title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.172 - Ledger control
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.172 - Ledger control

State Regulations

The control of a subsidiary record or ledger by the use
of a control account. Ledger control is limited to a proof that all items were
recorded in the subsidiary record or that they were accurately made, as
required, to the debit and credit sides of that record. It does not furnish
proof that every item was recorded in its proper account in the subsidiary
record. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10

451.172

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
